stripped_text: Whenever you do damage or trash 1 or more cards from HQ, place 1 power counter on this identity. When your turn begins, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards and add the rest to HQ.
stripped_title: AU Co.: The Gold Standard in Clones
text:
Whenever you do damage or trash 1 or more cards from HQ, place 1 power counter on this identity.
When your turn begins, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards and add the rest to HQ.
title: AU Co.: The Gold Standard in Clones
